EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Prevent your computer from going to sleep while downloads are in progress.

WELCOME_MESSAGE.message: Thanks for installing Awake, the extension that prevents your system from going to sleep. To get started:

TUTORIAL_STEP_1.message: Pin the extension icon and click it to enable or disable the keep awake utility or use the keyboard shortcut $shortcut$.

TUTORIAL_STEP_2.message: When you start downloading a file, Awake will automatically activate.

TUTORIAL_STEP_3.message: Right-click the extension icon for preferences.
